headline: Eversource Dividend Streak Continues As Focus Returns To Core Utilities
summary: Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) approved its 26th consecutive annual dividend increase. The company recently exited its offshore wind partnership with Orsted. Management is refocusing on core regulated utility operations while keeping sustainability as a priority. Eversource Energy, a major regulated utility serving New England, is known for its focus on electric, gas and water distribution. The latest dividend decision and the move away from the joint offshore wind venture with Orsted come as...
